meanings: (붙은 것을) take (sth) off, remove, detach (sth from sth)
give a share[portion] of the profit

vlive.korean: [묻은 거 떼어주는 쏘스윗 예지] 땅콩... [So sweet YEJI] Peanuts. 듣기 View video ITZY : ITZY(있지) IT'z TOURBOOK EP03
떼어볼까요? Should I take it off? 듣기 View video SOJEONG : 무더운 여름, 외출 전 피부케어 하는 과정 및 초간단 메이크업 GET Ready WITH ME│소정 Sojeong
제가 하나씩 떼어줬어요. So I gave him a piece. 듣기 View video PENTAGON : Shinwon say something
vlive.english: So I gave him a piece.

vlive.korean: 나를 닮은... - 상관없어요 - 그렇죠? - 이거 반만 떼어줄 수 있어요? It doesn't matter. - Right? - Can you give me half of this? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] STRAY KIDS X CouchTalk - 스트레이 키즈 X 카우치토크
vlive.english: It doesn't matter. - Right? - Can you give me half of this?

vlive.korean: 댓글에 혹시 형이 다정하게 누구 얼굴에 묻는 걸 떼어줬나요? A comment said...did you kindly take something off someone's face? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] MONSTA X x Eating Show - 몬스타엑스 X 같이 먹어요
vlive.english: A comment said...did you kindly take something off someone's face?

examples.korean: He brushed a cobweb out of his hair. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 머리를 빗어 거미줄을 떼어 냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.english: Detach the coupon and return it as soon as possible Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She picked bits of fluff from his sweater. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 그의 스웨터에서 보풀을 떼어 주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She picked bits of fluff from his sweater. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She gently disengaged herself from her sleeping son. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 잠이 든 아들에게서 가만히 몸을 떼어 냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She gently disengaged herself from her sleeping son. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He grabbed Ben, wrenching him away from his mother. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 벤을 움켜잡고 그의 어머니에게서 확 떼어 냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He grabbed Ben, wrenching him away from his mother. Add to Wordbook
